outputs.name: fac_par
outputs.description:
A list of properties for different cardinal directions to be
plugged into the "HB Apertures by Ratio" component or the "HB Louver
Shades" component.

inputs.name: _north_
inputs.description: Glazing parameter (boolean, float) for the north.

inputs.name: _east_
inputs.description: Glazing parameter (boolean, float) for the east.

inputs.name: _south_
inputs.description: Glazing parameter (boolean, float) for the south.

inputs.name: _west_
inputs.description: Glazing parameter (boolean, float) for the west.

name: HB Facade Parameters
description:
Generate lists of facadce properties ordanized by the four primary cardinal
directions.
_
Such properties can be glazing ratios, glazing heigths, sill heights, horizontal/
vertical glazing splits for the "HB Apertures by Ratio" component. Or they could
be shade depths, angles, etc. for the "HB Louver Shades" component.
-
